title: Part A

title: Part B

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating a similar impact of the Green Revolution in South Asia and East Asia.

Two points for explaining why the Green Revolution had similar impacts on farming in South Asia and East Asia.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that more women were educated in East Asia, South Asia, or Africa.

Two points for explaining how the relationship between wheat farming practices impacted the education of women.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following relationships between changes in wheat farming practices and the education of women.
